code.installcode:
# Create vbnexus users table $vbulletin->db->query_write(" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `" . TABLE_PREFIX . "vbnexus_user` ( `service` enum('fb','gfc') NOT NULL, `nonvbid` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `associated` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`service`,`nonvbid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1; ");
# Move records from older versions to the new table// check for new columns and add if necessary if($vbulletin->db->query_first("SHOW TABLES LIKE '" . TABLE_PREFIX . "vbnexus_nonvbuser'")) { $vbulletin->db->query_write(" INSERT IGNORE INTO `" . TABLE_PREFIX . "vbnexus_user` (`service`, `nonvbid`, `userid`, `associated`) SELECT IF(`type` = 1, 'fb', 'gfc'), CONCAT(IF(`nonvbid` < 10000000000000000000 AND `type` = 2, '0', ''), CAST(`nonvbid` AS CHAR)), `userid`, `associated` FROM `" . TABLE_PREFIX . "vbnexus_nonvbuser` "); }

Notice

Due to the recent announcement that Google will be shutting down Friend Connect on March 1, we need to update all Friend Connect accounts.

Make sure to provide a valid email and password below to prevent loss of access to this forum. Thank you!

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: Select in which spot to place vB Nexus Login Buttons (relative to the usual login form)
Buttons Positioning

You can set this option any time later without prejudice to existing users. When Facebook Feeds and Notifications is enabled, users are prompted (once) to give your application publish_stream permission
Enable Feeds and Notifications
Enter your FB Application ID to enable Facebook Social Plugin service
Facebook Application Id
Enter your FB Application Secret to enable Facebook Social Plugin service
Facebook Application Secret
Enter your GFC site ID to enable Google Friend Connect service
Google Friend Connect Site ID

When enabled (not recommended), users will have to explicitly uncheck the "Publish to Stream" option if they don't want to post to their streams.

This option only makes sense when Feeds and Notifications is enabled
Check "Publish to Stream" buttons by default
